chatgpt_context.description: This table records the GPS based locations of the different trucks identified by track ids over time moving along routes in Washington DC. This table is continuously receiving new locations as they are recorded. It only keeps GPS data for the last two hours.
chatgpt_context.rules: The function ST_TRACKLENGTH(lat, lon, t, 1) returns the total length of a track in meters whose position values are specified by lat (x) & lon (y) and whose ordering is determined by an ascending sort on the timestamp t.

chatgpt_context.description: This table contains rough spatial outlines of different landmarks (National Cathedral, Tidal Basin, Lincoln memorial etc.) in Washington DC.
This table contains information about taxi trips in New York City. The data includes pick up and drop off points, fare amounts, number of passenger and other details.

dbd460c0-f59e-11ed-95d7-858ce0a4c585.name: Block 1
dbd460c0-f59e-11ed-95d7-858ce0a4c585.content:
"-- A table to store the position of trucks over time.
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE truck_locations
(
    x float,
    y float,
    TRACKID varchar(64),
    DEPOT_ID integer,
    sids integer,
    TIMESTAMP timestamp,
    shard_key(TRACKID)
);

-- Load data
LOAD DATA INTO truck_locations
FROM FILE PATH ''
FORMAT JSON
WITH OPTIONS (
    DATA SOURCE = 'truck_locations_source',
    SUBSCRIBE = TRUE,
    TYPE_INFERENCE_MODE = 'speed',
    ERROR_HANDLING = 'permissive',
    kafka_subscription_cancel_after = 120 -- cancels the stream after 120 minutes
);

-- Create a view to represent the last 2 hours of data
CREATE OR REPLACE MATERIALIZED VIEW recent_locations
REFRESH EVERY 5 SECONDS AS 
SELECT * 
FROM truck_locations 
WHERE TIMEBOUNDARYDIFF('HOUR', TIMESTAMP, NOW()) < 2"

dbd460c0-f59e-11ed-95d7-858ce0a4c585.name: Block
dbd460c0-f59e-11ed-95d7-858ce0a4c585.content:
"CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE dc_fences 
(
    fence_id int,
    wkt geometry,
    fence_label varchar(32)
);"

dbd460c0-f59e-11ed-95d7-858ce0a4c585.name: Block
dbd460c0-f59e-11ed-95d7-858ce0a4c585.content:
"
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS taxi_trips;
-- Load the historical trip data into Kinetica
LOAD DATA INTO taxi_trips
FROM FILE PATHS 'taxi_data.parquet'
FORMAT PARQUET
WITH OPTIONS (
    DATA SOURCE = 'quickstart'
);"
